clip.quote: The reason you do things changes the way you do things.
clip.why_clipworthy: It challenges the conventional approach to goal setting and emphasizes intrinsic motivation.
clip.suggested_hook: Why your goals might be holding you back more than helping you.

clip.quote: My success is not predicated on the circumstances.
clip.why_clipworthy: Offers a refreshing perspective on market fluctuations and personal agency.
clip.suggested_hook: How to thrive in any market condition.

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "(0:00-0:08) What if your success isn't tied to the market? Here's how to thrive, no matter the conditions.",
    "SETUP": "(0:08-0:18) Meet Kelly Parker, a real estate expert who believes your success is independent of market fluctuations.",
    "INSIGHT": "(0:18-0:40) Kelly shares her contrarian take: 'My success is not predicated on the circumstances.' She emphasizes focusing on personal growth, client experience, and building strong relationships.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "(0:40-0:52) This mindset shift empowers you to control your destiny. Apply it by setting clear goals and celebrating your achievements.",
    "CTA": "(0:52-0:60) How do you plan to thrive in any market? Share your thoughts and join the conversation!"
  },
  "CAPTION": "Success isn't about the market; it's about you. Thrive in any condition with Kelly Parker's insights.",
  "HASHTAGS": ["#RealEstateSuccess", "#MarketProof", "#GoalSetting", "#ClientExperience", "#PersonalGrowth"],
  "CONTENT_PILLAR": "real_talk"
}
```
